book.title: Learning XML
book.Title: List item 4 is empty and lead to the same place in article as item 5 in block "Content" in thr article "Oil price outlook 2023: Here’s what the analysts think" NOTE: The same bug in the article"Bank of England interest rates: How high will they go?" in list item 3 (News and Analisis -> Explainers -> Economics)
book.Steps: 1. Navigate to capital.com 2. Click button [Burger menu] 3. Click menu item [News and Analysis] 4. Click item [Commodies] 5. Click article "Oil price outlook 2023: Here’s what the analysts think" 6. Click block "Content"
book.Expected_Result: Each list items has content and lead to the diffrent places in article
book.Actual_Result: List item 4 is empty and lead to the same place in the article as item 5
